titles.title: Providing for an adjournment of the House.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.
Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 1/28/2009--Passed Senate without amendment. (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.) Declares that, when the House adjourns: (1) on Wednesday, January 28, 2009, it stand adjourned until 2 p.m. on Monday, February 2, 2009; and (2) on Wednesday, February 4, 2009, it stand adjourned until 2 p.m. on Monday, February 9, 2009.
